mapper.sql: id, mnsc_name, mnsc_cat_id, mnsc_cat_names, expire_date, mnsc_url, remarks, state, score, sort, create_date, create_by, create_name
mapper.insert:
insert into ts_MNSC
id,
mnsc_name,
mnsc_cat_id,
mnsc_cat_names,
expire_date,
mnsc_url,
remarks,
state,
score,
sort,
create_date,
create_by,
create_name,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mnscName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mnscCatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mnscCatNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expireDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mnscUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ts_MNSC
mnsc_name = #{mnscName},
mnsc_cat_id = #{mnscCatId},
mnsc_cat_names = #{mnscCatNames},
expire_date = #{expireDate},
mnsc_url = #{mnscUrl},
remarks = #{remarks},
state = #{state},
score = #{score},
sort = #{sort},
create_date = #{createDate},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_name = #{createName},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from ts_MNSC where 1=1
and mnsc_cat_id = #{categoryId}
and instr(mnsc_name,#{searchStr})>0
order by sort desc,create_date desc

select
from ts_MNSC where instr(#{ids},id)>0 order by sort desc,create_date desc

select
from ts_MNSC where rownum <= #{rownum} order by sort desc,create_date desc

select * from ( select b.file_url imgUrl, c.cs logVisitCount, ts_MNSC.id, ts_MNSC.mnsc_name mnscName, ts_MNSC.mnsc_cat_names catNames, ts_MNSC.score score, ts_MNSC.remarks remarks, ts_MNSC.sort sort, ts_MNSC.create_date createDate, ts_MNSC.create_by createBy, ts_MNSC.create_name createName from ts_MNSC left join comm_archive b on ts_MNSC.id=b.obj_id and upper(b.obj_tabname)='TS_MNSC' and archive_type='img' left join (select obj_type, obj_id, count(*) cs from log_visit group by obj_type, obj_id) c on upper(c.obj_type)='TS_MNSC' and c.obj_id=ts_MNSC.id order by ts_MNSC.create_date desc ) where rownum <= #{rownum}
